name: Brakeimage
tagline: JS plugin still beta that split an images in different parts
body: # BrakeImage ![](http://www.elephantthinker.com/breakeimage/1.png) ![](http://www.elephantthinker.com/breakeimage/2.png) ![](http://www.elephantthinker.com/breakeimage/3.png) JS plugin still beta that split an images in different parts and also you can add some feature, Clone the Repository and open the index file. Have Fun..... ##Required You need JQUERY. ## Config var options; options = { timeX: 20, /*Time of image*/ img: '.br', /*Image Selector could be ID or a Class*/ type: 'down', /*Time : line, up, down, sin*/ gutter: 1, /* space between slices */ position: 'none', /*Float: Right, Left or none*/ factor: 3 /*Factor of separation in the top and bottom*/ }; var x = new BreakImage(options); ###TODO * Pending built the Break thought attributes. * Add as Jquery Plugin. * Why not take out Jquery..
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
